Package Game

Class Animal

java.lang.Object
Game.Animal
Direct Known Subclasses:
Chicken, Cow, Pig
public class Animal
extends java.lang.Object
parent Class for farm animals which are stored in the farm class. animals are purchased through the store and will generate income each day depending on their health and happiness levels which are raised through feeding and playing. hunger and happiness decay if not fed or tended to.

  • Constructor Details

    • Animal

      public Animal​(java.lang.String type, int price, int happy, int reward, int healthLevel)
      super constructor which is called through child classes
      Parameters:
      type - - string that denotes which type of animal it is
      price - - price that it is sold for in the shop
      happy - - base happiness when purchased
      reward - - base income generated daily when purchased
      healthLevel - - the health the animal has when purchased
